get.summary: gets an history of an planned maintenance
gets a planned maintenance
gets an history of an incident
gets the component with the impact level

put.summary: updates the link between the incident and the component

post.summary: creates the link between the incident and the component

delete.summary: unlink an incident and a component

patch.summary: patches the link between the incident and the component

get.summary: gets a incident
gets a component category
gets a component of a component category
list planned maintenances

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Zero-based page index (0..N)

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The size of the page to be returned

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

parameters.name: unpaged
parameters.description: Flag to return the results unpaged.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Parameter to specify a search query.
